character_skills.localised_description: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.

character_skills.localised_description: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Virtue cannot be acquired, only nurtured.

character_skills.localised_description: Virtue cannot be acquired, only nurtured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Raise your sail one foot and you get ten feet of wind.

character_skills.localised_description: Raise your sail one foot and you get ten feet of wind.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Coherence in thought and speech brings clear advantage.

character_skills.localised_description: Coherence in thought and speech brings clear advantage.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The pillar is strongest at its base.

character_skills.localised_description: The pillar is strongest at its base.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Everyone eats and drinks, yet only few appreciate the taste of food.

character_skills.localised_description: Everyone eats and drinks, yet only few appreciate the taste of food.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Burn long, and brightly.

character_skills.localised_description: Burn long, and brightly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Strike with violence. Always.

character_skills.localised_description: Strike with violence. Always.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Never forget, never forgive.

character_skills.localised_description: Never forget, never forgive.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Do not hold back what clamours for release.

character_skills.localised_description: Do not hold back what clamours for release.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nothing baffles evil like calm composure and propriety.

character_skills.localised_description: Nothing baffles evil like calm composure and propriety.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who fear nothing do not stumble along life's rubble-strewn path.

character_skills.localised_description: Those who fear nothing do not stumble along life's rubble-strewn path.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Understanding cannot be taught, only felt instinctively.

character_skills.localised_description: Understanding cannot be taught, only felt instinctively.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Never lose sight of the prize, no matter the obstacles along the way.

character_skills.localised_description: Never lose sight of the prize, no matter the obstacles along the way.

localised_description.last_approved_text: What you do not wish upon yourself, extend not to others.

character_skills.localised_description: What you do not wish upon yourself, extend not to others.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The industrious need no orders to galvanise them into action.

character_skills.localised_description: The industrious need no orders to galvanise them into action.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Accuracy safeguards energy, so it is never wasted.

character_skills.localised_description: Accuracy safeguards energy, so it is never wasted.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like the weather, one's fortune may change by the evening.

character_skills.localised_description: Like the weather, one's fortune may change by the evening.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The crafty fox evades the farmer's blade.

character_skills.localised_description: The crafty fox evades the farmer's blade.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Abandon fixed ideas, they will only hold you back.

character_skills.localised_description: Abandon fixed ideas, they will only hold you back.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With no knowledge of what cannot be done, you will accomplish great things.

character_skills.localised_description: With no knowledge of what cannot be done, you will accomplish great things.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whomsoever depends on themselves will attain the greatest happiness.

character_skills.localised_description: Whomsoever depends on themselves will attain the greatest happiness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Do not let emotion cloud your acuity.

character_skills.localised_description: Do not let emotion cloud your acuity.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.

character_skills.localised_description: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wise make their own decisions, the ignorant follow public opinion.

character_skills.localised_description: The wise make their own decisions, the ignorant follow public opinion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A nation's treasure is in its scholars.

character_skills.localised_description: A nation's treasure is in its scholars.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.

character_skills.localised_description: A crisis is an opportunity riding the dangerous wind.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

character_skills.localised_description: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A gem is not polished without rubbing, nor a man perfected without trials.

character_skills.localised_description: A gem is not polished without rubbing, nor a man perfected without trials.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.

character_skills.localised_description: To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When you drink the water, remember the spring.

character_skills.localised_description: When you drink the water, remember the spring.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With great authority comes great responsibility.

character_skills.localised_description: With great authority comes great responsibility.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.

character_skills.localised_description: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.

character_skills.localised_description: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Yuan Shao directs and empowers his forces from a… safer distance.

character_skills.localised_description: Yuan Shao directs and empowers his forces from a… safer distance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cao Cao's ordered mind encourages his forces to more efficient action!

character_skills.localised_description: Cao Cao's ordered mind encourages his forces to more efficient action!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Liu Bei's words drive his men to greatness!

character_skills.localised_description: Liu Bei's words drive his men to greatness!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.

character_skills.localised_description: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With skin of earth, arrows rebound, harmless.

character_skills.localised_description: With skin of earth, arrows rebound, harmless.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nature itself provides a shield for its warriors.

character_skills.localised_description: Nature itself provides a shield for its warriors.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

character_skills.localised_description: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

character_skills.localised_description: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

character_skills.localised_description: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tyrant laughs as blades glance harmlessly off his armour.

character_skills.localised_description: The tyrant laughs as blades glance harmlessly off his armour.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Zhang Fei's burly howl can rout an entire regiment!

character_skills.localised_description: Zhang Fei's burly howl can rout an entire regiment!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A charge of great power, draining Xiahou Yuan's focus.

character_skills.localised_description: A charge of great power, draining Xiahou Yuan's focus.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As Sun Ce's strength rises, his grip on rationality weakens…

character_skills.localised_description: As Sun Ce's strength rises, his grip on rationality weakens…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The roar of fury crushes enemy morale!

character_skills.localised_description: The roar of fury crushes enemy morale!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a final burst of speed, battle's end is hastened.

character_skills.localised_description: With a final burst of speed, battle's end is hastened.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A devastating swing with the power of the risen inferno!

character_skills.localised_description: A devastating swing with the power of the risen inferno!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A flurry of shafts slows the enemy advance.

character_skills.localised_description: A flurry of shafts slows the enemy advance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a single shot, Sun Ren brings death.

character_skills.localised_description: With a single shot, Sun Ren brings death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ma Chao's internal strife manifests in bursts of rage; uncontrollable charges at the enemy!

character_skills.localised_description: Ma Chao's internal strife manifests in bursts of rage; uncontrollable charges at the enemy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.

character_skills.localised_description: The forest provides a path, and surer footing, for the respectful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a mighty sweep, Lü Bu strikes all around him.

character_skills.localised_description: With a mighty sweep, Lü Bu strikes all around him.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tyrant rages; his men hold through fear.

character_skills.localised_description: The tyrant rages; his men hold through fear.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fury of the victorious warrior is fearful to behold!

character_skills.localised_description: The fury of the victorious warrior is fearful to behold!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The more he is opposed, the stronger Lü Bu becomes!

character_skills.localised_description: The more he is opposed, the stronger Lü Bu becomes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With a mighty cleave, Zhang Fei rends his foes' defences.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An outnumbered army will fight even harder. Skill trumps numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fury of the victorious warrior is fearful to behold!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Recalling their training, these generals reload with startling quickness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With calm, steely resolve, attacks are better deflected.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is more in the sea than can be glimpsed on the surface.

character_skills.localised_description: There is more in the sea than can be glimpsed on the surface.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chase a bird and it will fly away; be still and it will perch nearby.

character_skills.localised_description: Chase a bird and it will fly away; be still and it will perch nearby.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Be content with what you have to guard against temptation.

character_skills.localised_description: Be content with what you have to guard against temptation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Practice stillness to be ready and withstand any strike.

character_skills.localised_description: Practice stillness to be ready and withstand any strike.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Where others see rocks and trees, you see advantages.

character_skills.localised_description: Where others see rocks and trees, you see advantages.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.

character_skills.localised_description: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Generations working the land will breed a kinship with it.

character_skills.localised_description: Generations working the land will breed a kinship with it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A soldier always fights better when they know their sides and rear are protected.

character_skills.localised_description: A soldier always fights better when they know their sides and rear are protected.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.

character_skills.localised_description: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowing your brothers will never abandon you brings tremendous comfort.

character_skills.localised_description: Knowing your brothers will never abandon you brings tremendous comfort.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowing when best to shoot is most effective when you are the one being shot at.

character_skills.localised_description: Knowing when best to shoot is most effective when you are the one being shot at.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Look up and you will see the sky; look inward and you will see heaven.

character_skills.localised_description: Look up and you will see the sky; look inward and you will see heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When the opportunity is right let discipline be second to the unconventional.

character_skills.localised_description: When the opportunity is right let discipline be second to the unconventional.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These words will bring shame and humiliation.

character_skills.localised_description: These words will bring shame and humiliation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These words will fortify the spirit.

character_skills.localised_description: These words will fortify the spirit.
